short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BD tracking is an online tool to check bluedart courier status online. You can check your bluedart courier status in 2 minutes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the help of BD Tracking, you can check the status of your bluedart consignment online. Please follow the below instructions to track your order status.

Please find your waybill/reference number from the receipt.
If you have waybill/AWB number then select the first button. If you have a reference number then select the second button.
Enter your waybill/reference number in the box and click on the “Track Status” button.
Status of your bluedart courier will be displayed on the screen.
